Class Support

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.barryholroyd.prodlisthpdemo.support.Support

extends java.lang.Object
    Common support that can be provided with static methods.
    Author:
    Barry Holroyd

      • trc

        public static void trc(boolean flag,
                       java.lang.String component,
                       java.lang.String msg)
        Workhorse trc method -- toggle-controlled logging.

        This is called by module-specific trace() methods. Other than that, it should not be called directly.

        Parameters:
        flag - print the message iff flag is "true".
        component - the component being traced.
        msg - the message to be logged.

      • getActivity

        public static android.app.Activity getActivity(java.lang.ref.WeakReference<android.app.Activity> wrActivity,
                                               java.lang.String msg)
        Wrapper used by background methods which want to use the Activity passed to them as a WeakReference.

        If the Activity has gone away (e.g., due to a device rotation), then the get() method should return null and an error message is printed to the log file. The caller of this method needs to check to see if the returned value is null or not.

        Parameters:
        wrActivity - WeakReference for the Activity.
        msg - error message to print out if the Activity has gone away.
        Returns:
        the Activity, if still valid; else null.

      • truncImageString

        public static java.lang.String truncImageString(java.lang.String name)
        Truncate a Url or filename for an image to just the final component.
        Parameters:
        name - name to be truncated. Must have "images" just before the last component.
        Returns:
        the trailing component (e.g., image.jpeg, image-5).

      • htmlToText

        public static java.lang.String htmlToText(java.lang.String in)
        Translate HTML tags (embedded in text) to simple text. Poor man's version -- mostly, just removes tags.
        Parameters:
        in - input text (e.g., pulled from JSON).
        Returns:
        output text (without HTML tags).

      • getKeyProductInfo

        public static java.lang.String getKeyProductInfo(android.content.Context c)
        "Intent extra" key: identifies product info data when starting ActivityProductInfo activity.
        Parameters:
        c - standard Context instance from the current Activity.
